caption:
The photograph depicts a bustling beach scene teeming with people engaged in various activities. The setting is sunny with clear skies, indicating a vibrant day suited for beach outings. In the ocean, numerous individuals are swimming and splashing in the shallow clear waters. Some children are seen playing, and a few people are using floatation devices.

On the sandy beach, many visitors are sunbathing, with some resting on towels and others lounging on beach chairs under umbrellas that provide shade from the sun. These umbrellas are coordinated in style, suggesting that they might be part of a beachfront property or resort service.

The background features palm trees and a building that appears to be a hotel or resort, characterized by its tropical architectural style. The presence of palm trees enhances the beach ambience, adding to the tropical vacation feel of the scene.

Overall, the composition of the photo is lively, capturing a typical tourist beach atmosphere filled with people enjoying a sunny day by the sea. The image is evenly exposed and offers a glimpse into leisure activities common in such a coastal resort area.
title: Waikiki Beach is the most popular tourist spot on the island. There are 26,000 hotel rooms on Oahu. Most of them are in the Waikiki area.
